name: Power Drop
description:
Best Played In Full Screen ;).

Your a robot running out of power trying to survive. Move around and collect batteries to replenish your power. Watch out though there are traps that will take your energy if hit.

Instructions:

Click to move, but be careful it uses energy!

Batteries:

Collect the batteries to replenish your energy, the batteries give different amounts so prioritize well.

Red battery:  20 energy

Yellow  battery: 30 energy

Green  battery: 60 energy

Created By:

Noah Beckman & Shane Stevens

Music By: Will Ellis
